snippet: The $27 billion hedge fund recommended that the two providers of voice and video communications equipment merge, as part of a wave of consolidation in the telecom equipment sector.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook Online; activist hedge fund Elliott Management says it has bought 6.6 percent stake in Polycom and 6.3 percent stake in Mitel.
lead_paragraph: The $27 billion hedge fund recommended that the two providers of voice and video communications equipment merge, as part of a wave of consolidation in the telecom equipment sector.

headline.main: Elliott Management Acquires Stakes in Polycom and Mitel
